mail.robin_shelter.title: Old Blueprints
mail.robin_shelter.body: Hey @,^I found these old blueprints for a 'Ladybug Shelter' in the attic. My grandfather swore by them to keep pests away naturally.^I'm selling the recipe at the shop now if you want to try it out!^   - Robin
mail.clint_analyzer.title: Soil Contamination?
mail.clint_analyzer.body: Hello @,^I've noticed something disturbing in the soil samples lately. It seems the runoff from the old Joja distribution center is affecting the valley's nutrients.^Pierre and I worked on a prototype to measure this 'NPK' sickness. I have the recipe available at the Blacksmith's shop. You should check your soil often.^   - Clint
mail.pierre_spreader.title: Ultimate Farming Tech!
mail.pierre_spreader.body: Congratulations on your farming success, @!^Since you're such a valued customer, I wanted to share my latest invention. It spreads fertilizer automatically!^Just don't tell Morris I gave you this for free...^   - Pierre
mail.qi_upgrades.title: Beyond Limits
mail.qi_upgrades.body: I see you have begun automating your farm, @.^Pierre's device is charming, but limited. If you wish to reach true perfection, you must push nature further.^I have enclosed blueprints for advanced modification. Use them wisely.^   - Mr. Qi
mail.demetrius_n.title: Nitrogen Study
mail.demetrius_n.body: Greetings!^Following Clint's report on soil depletion, I've isolated a compound to restore Nitrogen levels using common Sap.^Here is the formula. It should help with leafy growth.^   - Demetrius
mail.evelyn_p.title: A gardening tip
mail.evelyn_p.body: Dear @,^George told me about the soil troubles. Back in my day, we used clay to help roots grow strong.^I wrote down how we used to mix it to boost Phosphorus. Hope it helps, dear!^   - Granny Evelyn
mail.jodi_k.title: Potassium trick
mail.jodi_k.body: Hi there!^I heard you're fighting pollution on the farm. Kent taught me that fiber can be processed to restore Potassium.^We need to keep our valley clean! Here's how you make it.^   - Jodi
